title: Tax liens; registered land
context: [ยง231-64] Tax liens; registered land. If the land has been registered in the land court, the state tax collector shall also send by registered mail a notice of the proposed sale to any person holding a mortgage or other lien registered in the office of the assistant registrar of the land court. The notice shall be sent to any such person at the person&rsquo;s last address as shown by the records in the office of the registrar, and shall be deposited in the mail at least forty-five days prior to the date set for the sale. [L 1989, c 14, pt of ยง1(1)]
